alert.note: Alert for Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 27 at 7:29PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Withlacoochee River At Croom affecting Pasco and Sumter Counties. Withlacoochee At US 41 Dunnellon affecting Citrus and Levy Counties. Hillsborough River At Morris Bridge affecting Hillsborough County. For the Withlacoochee...including US 301 Trilby, Croom, SR 200 Holder, US 41 Dunnellon...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Hillsborough...including Morris Bridge, Temple Terrace, Hillsborough River State Park...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River At Croom. * WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Farms and pastureland flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning and continue rising to 9.7 feet early Friday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 03/10/1958. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Withlacoochee River Croom 9.0 7.6 Tue 6 pm 7.6 8.4 10.0 10.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1030 AM EDT.
